author: jvanzyl
msg: - this a reworking of the turbine cache that i would eventually like
to use in velocity and roll back into turbine. it's not being used
right now but will be shortly. i would like to make it the cache
accept permanent, expirable and refreshable objects. expand on what
dave and nissim have done. right now i'm just using a hashtable
for the cache in the runtime but i would soon like to use these

author: jvanzyl
msg: - new version of template, more of a self managing template. i merged
some of CachedTemplate in here, so a template knows it's last
modified time, when it needs to be checked again. this now works
with the new loading mechanism and the centralized template

author: jvanzyl
msg: - updating the todo. just finished overhaul of the template loading
